original_name: [Abib] Quick Sunstick Protection Bar SPF50+ PA++++ (OTC Ver.)

description:
*Shipping Restriction Notice* Due to U.S. regulations concerning sunscreen products, the purchase of Beauty of Joseon Sunscreen is temporarily unavailable for customers in the United States. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding. Sales will resume once the regulatory issues are resolved. 
Description

What it is
Matte Sun Stick was developed with Ramón @glowbyramon, an influencer and cosmetic chemist, as the director. It was created after an extensive collaboration by meticulously going through all the processes that fall under BOJ's brand philosophy of Modern Hanbang skin care.

While most sun sticks are tailored for outdoor pursuits, we've designed ours to be just as beneficial in our everyday urban environments. Regular sunscreen reapplication every 2-3 hours is crucial for optimal SPF and PA protection, but it's often challenging. Therefore, we've engineered a sun stick with a matte formula that applies smoothly, without becoming clumpy or greasy, even when reapplied over makeup.

Our sun stick utilizes a sebum-control silica powder to regulate oil production, ensuring an adherence boost and a smooth, matte finish. Plus, it's packed with artemisia capillaris and green tea extracts, contributing to a smooth skin texture while preserving its hydration.

Non-greasy matte sun stick
It is a matte sun stick without any of the oily or sticky feelings. It is hygienic as you don’t need to apply it with your hands, and it is compact, enabling convenient use anytime, anywhere.

Porous sebum-control silica powder
Sebum-control silica powder regulates sebum on the skin, giving a smooth and soft-rolling feeling without greasiness.

Key ingredients
Artemisia Capillaris
Mugwort has been an important ingredient throughout the history of oriental medicine. And artemisia capillaris has a cooling property and has been used as a therapeutic medicine to lower body temperature since ancient times. It contains vitamins A and C as well as various minerals to help nourish and soothe the skin.

 

SPF & PA Protection
SPF and PA tests were completed in labs in both Korea and Spain, and the results are as follows.

[SPF]
Korean Lab : 55.8±7.8
Spain Lab: 61±6.6

[PA]
Korean Lab : UVA PF 18.5±3.0 P++++
Spain Lab: UVA PF 29.1±6.7 P++++
 
How To Use
Apply to areas that need sun protection, such as the face and body.
Reapply every 2-3 hours.

*If you extend the sun stick too far, dust may stick to it or it may break, so it is recommended to only extend it as much as needed.
*Due to its solid formula, excessive pressure may cause the product to separate from the container or break. Apply with a gentle rolling motion.
*Due to the nature of the stick formula, where physical pressure is needed, makeup may be removed when putting the product over makeup.

reviews.content: This sunscreen is phenomenal! My favorite sunscreen is the birch juice by Round Lab but I wanted something to easily apply on the go and this does not disappoint! It's lightweight and has a very soft, powdery finish that leaves no greasy residue. It works well as a primer too, the soft matte feeling is a great makeup base that keeps you oil free for longer! It does however take off a little bit of make-up when reapplied. If you have oily skin, it is great at mattifying problem areas without ruining the texture of the makeup underneath. Overall a 10/10 purchase since it has Niacinamide and Zinc and should help soothe acne prone skin as well!

description:
Description




Only One Touch, Forms a Skin Protective Film!
100% Mineral Sun Stick for the Whole Family with a broad-spectrum protection SPF50+/PA++++ 
UV mineral filter reflecting UV rays provides a soft and smooth finish on delicate skin without worrying about any irritation!
Unique format makes it easy to carry the product around and as well to re-apply it during the day! It has a soft texture that “glides” smoothly onto the skin without leaving a white cast or sticky feeling.
Hyaluronic acid helps hydrate the outer layers of skin, increasing skin moisture and reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Tocopherol or a Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant which helps fight free radical damage and promote skin healing to diminish signs of aging.


Suggested Use



At the final step of basic skin care, 20 to 30 minutes before going out, put an appropriate amount of Benton Mineral Sun Stick on the area exposed to UV rays and apply gently. Reapply as needed when exposed to strong sunlight. 
*There may be temporary white cast due to a unique characteristic of mineral ingredient, please tap lightly for absorption. After a certain period of time, it returns to its original skin color.
 
*Since it is a solid type, please use it little by little rather than putting it a lot on the skin from the beginning.

reviews.title: Mineral Sunstick a must for preventing pigmentatio…
reviews.content: I love taking this Benton mineral sense.Stick out with me for my adventures. I. Like to go rock climbing so I don't want sunscreen on my hands so the sun stick is very convenient for me to re apply during my adventures outdoors. Zinc oxide helps to prevent pigmentation by reflecting some of the sun's uv rays. It is also antiinflammatory.Mineral sunscreens physically block and reflect both UVA and UVB rays. UVA rays penetrate deeper into the skin and are primarily responsible for pigmentation issues like melasma and hyperpigmentation. By effectively blocking UVA, mineral sunscreens reduce the risk of pigment formation. Mineral sunscreens are stable under sun exposure, meaning they don’t degrade as quickly as some chemical sunscreens. This ensures consistent protection against pigmentation-causing UV rays throughout wear.
I love this sunscreen format because it's easy to carry with me at all times and I can always have it to retouch at any time, it's truly wonderful
